testcase.name: User can checkout product with some variant successfully - #1.1
testcase.system-out: When User logged in with "simanjuntakalbert57@gmail.com" and "XBf@rWNvByn!#K8".passed Then User is navigated to the products page.................................passed When User adds a product to the cart "ZARA COAT 3"..........................passed And User clicks on the cart icon............................................passed Then User verify the product is added to the cart "ZARA COAT 3".............passed When User click on the checkout button......................................passed Then User is navigated to checkout page.....................................passed When User fills in the shipping details.....................................passed And User click on the Place Order button....................................passed Then User verify the order is placed successfully...........................passed
